content: NEW YORK  Oct 31 U.S. East Coast refiners are sending gasoline barrels to western Pennsylvania instead of the New York Harbor market  compounding an unusual tightness in an area that helps set prices for the nation.
name: Buckeye Partners LP
title: Gasoline flows away from New York Harbor as Midwest prices soar

content: HOUSTON Buckeye Partners has resumed operations at its marine oil terminal and storage tanks in Puerto Rico  which could help ease shortages of diesel and gasoline on the island two weeks after it closed the facility ahead of Hurricane Maria.
name: Buckeye Partners LP
title: Buckeye resumes operation at Yabucoa  Puerto Rico; tankers discharge fuel

content: HOUSTON  Oct 3 Buckeye Partners has resumed operations at its marine oil terminal and storage tanks in Puerto Rico  which could help ease shortages of diesel and gasoline on the island two weeks after it closed the facility ahead of Hurricane Maria.
name: Buckeye Partners LP
title: UPDATE 1-Buckeye resumes operation at Yabucoa  Puerto Rico; tankers discharge fuel

content: HOUSTON  Oct 3 Buckeye Partners has resumed full operations at its oil terminal and storage tanks in Puerto Rico two weeks after it closed the facility ahead of Hurricane Maria  the company said on Tuesday.
name: Buckeye Partners LP
title: Buckeye Partners resumes operation at its Yabucoa oil terminal

content: HOUSTON  Sept 22 Buckeye Partners LP's Yabucoa oil terminal in Puerto Rico remained closed on Friday  the company said  days after Hurricane Maria left a trail of destruction and at least 25 people dead across the Caribbean.
name: Buckeye Partners LP
title: Buckeye Partners' Puerto Rico oil terminal still closed after Maria

content: HOUSTON  Sept 19 Several Caribbean oil storage terminals that temporarily closed ahead of Hurricane Irma earlier this month have started making preparations in case they have to shut again due to Hurricane Maria  which was a rare Category 5 storm on Tuesday.

title: UPDATE 1-Caribbean oil terminals make preparations ahead of Hurricane Maria

content: HOUSTON  Sept 12 Buckeye Partners LP said it aims to resume normal operations of its Bahamas crude oil and fuel terminal on Tuesday after Hurricane Irma  one of the most powerful Atlantic hurricanes on record  rampaged through the Caribbean.
name: Buckeye Partners LP
title: UPDATE 2-Buckeye targets normal operations at Bahamas oil terminal on Tuesday

content: HOUSTON  Sept 7 Buckeye Partners expects to resume limited operations at its Yabucoa oil terminal in Puerto Rico later on Thursday as  Hurricane Irma leaves the area  but said power is still out in the region.
name: Buckeye Partners LP
title: Buckeye readies Puerto Rico terminal restart after Irma leaves area

content: HOUSTON  Sept 6 Buckeye Partners has shut its Yabucoa oil terminal in Puerto Rico ahead of Hurricane Irma and is preparing for the storm at two other marine terminals in Florida and the Bahamas  the company said on Wednesday.
name: Buckeye Partners LP
title: Buckeye Partners shuts Puerto Rico oil terminal ahead of Hurricane Irma

content: NEW YORK  Aug 28 U.S. oil terminal operator Buckeye Partners LP said on Monday it was working to fully restart operations at its oil processing facility in Corpus Christi  Texas  by early Tuesday afternoon.
name: Buckeye Partners LP
title: Buckeye Partners aims to restart Corpus Christi facility by Tuesday

content: NEW YORK  Aug 27 U.S. terminal operator Buckeye Partners LP said on Sunday its facilities in Corpus Christi have not suffered major damage due to Tropical Storm Harvey.
name: Buckeye Partners LP
title: Buckeye says no major damage to Corpus Christi facilities; plant remains shut

content: NEW YORK  Aug 26 U.S. terminal operator Buckeye Partners LP said on Saturday there was minor flooding at its facility in Corpus Christi  Texas  in the wake of Tropical Storm Harvey.
name: Buckeye Partners LP
title: Buckeye Partners reports minor flooding at Corpus Christi facility

content: HOUSTON U.S. terminal operator Buckeye Partners has started shutting down its Corpus Christi facilities due to Hurricane Harvey  the company said in a statement on Friday.

content: NEW YORK From a Buckeye Partners oil depot in an industrial corner of Brooklyn  New York  clerk Peter Fernandez had bad news for bullish oil traders: so far this year  his heating oil pumps have been running at roughly half-speed.
name: Buckeye Partners LP
title: Analysis: Warm start to U.S. winter puts oil price rebound on ice
